question:
Pens cost 70 cents each and pencils cost 40 cents each. If Iris spent $5.20 on a total of 10 pens and pencils, how many pencils did she purchase? ($1 = 100 cents)
(A) 4
(B) 6
(C) 8
(D) 10
(E) 13
